Title: Relates to the designation and nomination of candidates for village office in village elections conducted on the day of the general election
Summary: Relates to the designation and nomination of candidates for village office in village elections conducted on the day of the general election.
LawCode: Desig Art 6 §§6-100 - 6-168 to be Title I, add Title Head, amd §6-200, El L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to the designation and nomination of candidates for village office in village elections conducted on the day of the general election
